original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Abhejjavagga
analyzed: a bhejja vagga

original: 4. Maccupāsamuttipañha
“Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe,
analyzed: na antalikkhe na samudda majjhe

original: Na pabbatānaṁ vivaraṁ pavissa;
analyzed: na pabbatānam vivaram pavissa

original: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso,
analyzed: na vijjati saḥ jagati padesaḥ

original: Yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya maccupāsā’ti.
analyzed: yatthaṭṭhitaḥ mucceyya maccu pāsā ati

original: Puna bhagavatā parittā ca uddiṭṭhā.
analyzed: puna bhagavatā parittā ca uddiṭṭhā

original: Seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathida

original: ratanasuttaṁ mettasuttaṁ khandhaparittaṁ moraparittaṁ dhajaggaparittaṁ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṁ aṅgulimālaparittaṁ.
analyzed: ratana suttam metta suttam khandha parittam mora parittam dhajagga parittam āṭānāṭiya parittam aṅgulimāla paritta

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, ākāsagatopi samuddamajjhagatopi pāsādakuṭileṇaguhāpabbhāradaribilagirivivarapabbatantaragatopi na muccati maccupāsā, tena hi parittakammaṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasenaḥ ākāsa gataḥ api samudda majjha gataḥ api pāsāda kuṭileṇa guhā pabbhāra dari bila giri vivara pabbata antara gataḥ api na muccati maccu pāsā tena hi paritta kammam micchā

original: Yadi parittakaraṇena maccupāsā parimutti bhavati, tena hi ‘na antalikkhe …pe…
analyzed: yadi paritta karaṇena maccupāsā parimutti bhavati tena hi na antalikkhe pe

original: maccupāsā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭiko pañhaḥ gaṇṭhitaḥ api gaṇṭhitaro tava an uppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘na antalikkhe …pe…
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā na antalikkhe pe

original: maccupāsā’ti, parittā ca bhagavatā uddiṭṭhā, tañca pana sāvasesāyukassa vayasampannassa apetakammāvaraṇassa, natthi, mahārāja, khīṇāyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā vā upakkamo vā.
analyzed: maccupāsā ati parittā ca bhagavatā uddiṭṭhā tat ca pana sa avasesa āyukassa vaya sampannassa apeta kamma āvaraṇassa natthi mahā rāja khīṇa āyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā vā upakkamaḥ vā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, matassa rukkhassa sukkhassa koḷāpassa nisnehassa uparuddhajīvitassa
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja matassa rukkhassa sukkhassa koḷāpassa nisnehassa uparuddha jīvitassa

original: gatāyusaṅkhārassa kumbhasahassenapi udake ākirante allattaṁ vā pallavitaharitabhāvo vā na bhaveyya;
analyzed: gata āyu saṅkhārassa kumbha sahassena api udake ākirante allattam vā pallavita harita bhāvaḥ vā na bhaveyya

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, bhesajjaparittakammena natthi khīṇāyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhesajja paritta kammena na atthi khīṇa āyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā

original: vā upakkamo vā, yāni tāni, mahārāja, mahiyā osadhāni bhesajjāni, tānipi khīṇāyukassa
analyzed: vā upakkamaḥ vā yāni tāni mahā rāja mahiyāḥ osadhāni bhesajjāni tāni api khīṇāyukassa

original: akiccakarāni bhavanti.
analyzed: a kit ca karāni bhavanti

original: Sāvasesāyukaṁ, mahārāja, vayasampannaṁ apetakammāvaraṇaṁ parittaṁ rakkhati gopeti, tassatthāya bhagavatā parittā uddiṭṭhā.
analyzed: sāvasesa āyuka mahā rāja vaya sampannam apeta kamma āvaraṇam parittam rakkhati gopeti tassa atthāya bhagavatā parittā uddiṭṭhā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, kassako paripakke dhaññe mate sassanāḷe udakappavesanaṁ vāreyya, yaṁ pana sassaṁ taruṇaṁ meghasannibhaṁ vayasampannaṁ, taṁ udakavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kassakaḥ paripakke dhaññe mate sassa nāḷe udaka ppavesanam vāreyya yam pana sassam taruṇam megha sannibham tam udaka vaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, khīṇāyukassa bhesajjaparittakiriyā ṭhapitā paṭikkhittā, ye
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja khīṇāyukassa bhesajja paritta kiriyā ṭhapitā paṭikkhittāḥ ye

original: pana te manussā sāvasesāyukā vayasampannā, tesaṁ atthāya parittabhesajjāni bhaṇitāni,
analyzed: pana te manussā sa avasesa āyukā vaya sampannā tesam atthāya paritta bhesajjāni bhaṇitāni

original: te parittabhesajjehi vaḍḍhantī”ti.
analyzed: te paritta bhesajjehi vaḍḍhanti iti

original: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, khīṇāyuko marati, sāvasesāyuko jīvati, tena hi parittabhesajjāni niratthakāni hontī”ti?
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena khīṇa āyukaḥ marati sa avasesa āyukaḥ jīvati tena hi paritta bhesajjāni niratthakāni honti iti

original: “Diṭṭhapubbo pana tayā, mahārāja, koci rogo bhesajjehi paṭinivattito”ti?
analyzed: diṭṭha pubbaḥ pana tayā mahā rāja koci rogaḥ bhesajjehi paṭinivattito ti

original: “Āma, bhante, anekasatāni diṭṭhānī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante aneka satāni diṭṭhāni iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhavatī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja paritta bhesajja kiriyā niratthakā ati yam tam micchā bhavati iti

original: “Dissanti, bhante nāgasena, vejjānaṁ upakkamā bhesajjapānānulepā, tena tesaṁ upakkamena rogo paṭinivattatī”ti.
analyzed: dissanti bhante nāgasena vejjānam upakkamāḥ bhesajja pāna anulepā tena tesam upakkamena rogaḥ paṭinivattati iti

original: “Parittānampi, mahārāja, pavattīyamānānaṁ saddo suyyati, jivhā sukkhati, hadayaṁ byāvaṭṭati, kaṇṭho āturati.
analyzed: parittānam pi mahā rāja pavattīyamānānam saddaḥ suyyati jivhā sukkhati hadayam byāvaṭṭati kaṇṭhaḥ āturati

original: Tena tesaṁ pavattena sabbe byādhayo vūpasamanti, sabbā ītiyo apagacchantīti.
analyzed: tena tesam pavattena sabbe byādhayaḥ vūpasamanti sabbāḥ ītiyaḥ apagacchanti iti

original: Diṭṭhapubbo pana tayā, mahārāja, koci ahinā daṭṭho mantapadena visaṁ pātīyamāno visaṁ cikkhassanto uddhamadho ācamayamāno”ti?
analyzed: diṭṭha pubbaḥ pana tayā mahā rāja koci ahinā daṭṭhaḥ manta padena visam pātīyamānaḥ visam cikkhassantaḥ uddham adhas ācamayamānaḥ iti

original: “Āma, bhante, ajjetarahipi taṁ loke vattatī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante tam loke vattati iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhavati.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja paritta bhesajja kiriyā niratthakā ati yam tam micchā bhavati

original: Kataparittañhi, mahārāja, purisaṁ ḍaṁsitukāmo ahi na ḍaṁsati, vivaṭaṁ mukhaṁ pidahati,
analyzed: kata parittam hi mahā rāja purisam ḍasitu kāmaḥ ahi na ḍasati vivaṭam mukham pidahati

original: corānaṁ ukkhittalaguḷampi na sambhavati, te laguḷaṁ muñcitvā pemaṁ karonti, kupitopi
analyzed: ukkhitta laguḷam pi na sambhavati te laguḷam muñcitvā karonti kupitaḥ api

original: hatthināgo samāgantvā uparamati, pajjalitamahāaggikkhandhopi upagantvā nibbāyati,
analyzed: hatthi nāgaḥ samāgantvā uparamati pajjalita mahā aggi khandhaḥ api upagantvā nibbāyati

original: visaṁ halāhalampi khāyitaṁ agadaṁ sampajjati, āhāratthaṁ vā pharati, vadhakā hantukāmā
analyzed: visam halāhalampi khāyitam agadam sampajjati āhāra attham vā pharati vadhakā hantu kāmā

original: upagantvā dāsabhūtā sampajjanti, akkantopi pāso na saṁvarati.
analyzed: upagantvā dāsa bhūtā sampajjanti a kkantaḥ api pāsaḥ na savarati

original: Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, ‘morassa kataparittassa sattavassasatāni luddako nāsakkhi pāsaṁ upanetuṁ, akataparittassa taṁ yeva divasaṁ pāsaṁ upanesī’”ti?
analyzed: suta pubbam pana tayā mahā rāja morassa kata parittassa satta vassa satāni luddakaḥ na asakkhi pāsam upanetu akata parittassa tam yeva divasam pāsam upanesi iti

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato so saddo sadevake loke”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati abbhuggataḥ so saddo sa devake loke iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhavati.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja paritta bhesajja kiriyā niratthakā ati yam tam micchā bhavati

original: Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, ‘dānavo bhariyaṁ parirakkhanto samugge pakkhipitvā
analyzed: suta pubbam pana tayā mahā rāja dānavaḥ bhariyam parirakkhantaḥ samugge pakkhipitvā

original: gilitvā kucchinā pariharati, atheko vijjādharo tassa dānavassa mukhena pavisitvā
analyzed: gilitvā kucchinā pariharati atha ekaḥ vijjādharaḥ tassa dānavassa mukhena pavisitvā

original: tāya saddhiṁ abhiramati, yadā so dānavo aññāsi, atha samuggaṁ vamitvā vivari, saha
analyzed: tāya saddhim abhiramati yadā saḥ dānavaḥ aññāsi atha samuggam vamitvā saha

original: samugge vivaṭe vijjādharo yathākāmaṁ pakkāmī’”ti?
analyzed: samugge vivaṭe vijjādharaḥ yathākāmam pakkāmi iti

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato sopi saddo sadevake loke”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati abbhuggataḥ saḥ api saddaḥ sa devake loke iti

original: “Nanu so, mahārāja, vijjādharo parittabalena gahaṇā mutto”ti.
analyzed: nanu saḥ mahā rāja vijjādharaḥ paritta balena gahaṇā muttaḥ iti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, atthi parittabalaṁ.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja atthi paritta bala

original: Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, ‘aparopi vijjādharo bārāṇasirañño antepure mahesiyā saddhiṁ sampaduṭṭho gahaṇappatto samāno khaṇena adassanaṁ gato mantabalenā’”ti.
analyzed: suta pubbam pana tayā mahā rāja aparaḥ api vijjādharaḥ bārāṇasi raññaḥ antepure mahesiyā saddhim sampaduṭṭhaḥ gahaṇa ppatto samānaḥ khaṇena adassanam gataḥ manta balena ati

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyatī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati iti

original: “Nanu so, mahārāja, vijjādharo parittabalena gahaṇā mutto”ti?
analyzed: nanu saḥ mahā rāja vijjādharaḥ paritta balena gahaṇā muttaḥ iti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, atthi parittabalan”ti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja atthi paritta balanti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, kiṁ sabbeyeva parittaṁ rakkhatī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kim sabbeyeva iva parittam rakkhati iti

original: “Ekacce, mahārāja, rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhatī”ti.
analyzed: ekacce mahā rāja rakkhati ekacce na rakkhati iti

original: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, parittaṁ na sabbatthikan”ti?
analyzed: tena hi bhante nāgasena parittam na sabbatthikam ti

original: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbesaṁ jīvitaṁ rakkhatī”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho mahā rāja bhojanam sabbesam jīvitam rakkhati iti

original: “Ekacce, bhante, rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhatī”ti.
analyzed: ekacce bhante rakkhati ekacce na rakkhati iti

original: “Kiṁ kāraṇā”ti.
analyzed: kim

original: “Yato, bhante, ekacce taṁyeva bhojanaṁ atibhuñjitvā visūcikāya marantī”ti.
analyzed: yatas bhante ekacce tayā iva bhojanam atibhuñjitvā visūcikāya maranti iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ na sabbesaṁ jīvitaṁ rakkhatī”ti?
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja bhojanam na sabbesam jīvitam rakkhati iti

original: “Dvīhi, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇehi bhojanaṁ jīvitaṁ harati atibhuttena vā usmādubbalatāya vā, āyudadaṁ, bhante nāgasena, bhojanaṁ durupacārena jīvitaṁ haratī”ti.
analyzed: dvīhi bhante nāgasena kāraṇehi bhojanam jīvitam harati ati bhuttena vā usmā dubbala tāya vā āyudada bhante nāgasena bhojanam durupacārena jīvitam harati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, parittaṁ ekacce rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhati.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja parittam ekacce rakkhati ekacce na rakkhati

original: Tīhi, mahārāja, kāraṇehi parittaṁ na rakkhati kammāvaraṇena, kilesāvaraṇena, asaddahanatāya.
analyzed: tīhi mahā rāja kāraṇehi parittam na rakkhati kamma āvaraṇena kilesa āvaraṇena asat dahana tāya

original: Sattānurakkhaṇaṁ, mahārāja, parittaṁ attanā katena ārakkhaṁ jahati, yathā, mahārāja,
analyzed: satta anurakkhaṇa mahā rāja parittam attanā katena ārakkham jahati yathā mahā rāja

original: mātā puttaṁ kucchigataṁ poseti, hitena upacārena janeti, janayitvā asucimalasiṅghāṇikamapanetvā
analyzed: mātā puttam kucchi gatam poseti hitena upacārena janeti janayitvā asuci mala siṅghāṇikam apanetvā

original: uttamavarasugandhaṁ upalimpati, so aparena samayena paresaṁ putte akkosante vā paharante vā pahāraṁ deti.
analyzed: uttama vara sugandham upalimpati saḥ aparena samayena paresam putte akkosante vā paharante vā pahāram deti

original: Te tassa kujjhitvā parisāya ākaḍḍhitvā taṁ gahetvā sāmino upanenti, yadi pana tassā putto aparaddho hoti velātivatto.
analyzed: te tassa kujjhitvā parisāya ākaḍḍhitvā tam gahetvā sāminaḥ upanenti yadi pana tassā puttaḥ aparaddhaḥ hoti velā ativatto

original: Atha naṁ sāmino manussā ākaḍḍhayamānā daṇḍamuggarajāṇumuṭṭhīhi tāḷenti pothenti, api nu kho, mahārāja, tassa mātā labhati ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaṁ gāhaṁ sāmino upanayanaṁ kātun”ti?
analyzed: atha nam sāminaḥ manussāḥ ākaḍḍhayamānāḥ daṇḍa muggara jāṇu muṭṭhīhi tāḷenti pothenti api nu kho mahā rāja tassa mātā labhati ākaḍḍhana parikaḍḍhanam gāham sāminaḥ upanayanam kātunti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kena kāraṇena, mahārājā”ti.
analyzed: kena kāraṇena mahā rājā ati

original: “Attano, bhante, aparādhenā”ti.
analyzed: attanaḥ bhante aparādhena ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, sattānaṁ ārakkhaṁ parittaṁ attano aparādhena vañjhaṁ karotī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sattānam ārakkham parittam attanaḥ aparādhena vañjham karoti iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, suvinicchito pañho, gahanaṁ agahanaṁ kataṁ, andhakāro āloko kato, viniveṭhitaṁ diṭṭhijālaṁ, tvaṁ gaṇivarapavaramāsajjā”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena su vinicchito pañhaḥ gahanam agahanam andhakāro āloko kataḥ viniveṭhitam diṭṭhi jāla tvam gaṇi vara pavaram āsajjāti

original: Maccupāsamuttipañho catuttho.
analyzed: maccu pāsamutti pañhaḥ catutthaḥ
